title: They Called Him Peter
description: This story is about coming of age story, filled with mystery and a who done it story. The reader will not be able to put it down, once you start to read it you will want to read it until you reach the end. Watch as this story of seduction,murder, and betrayal unfolds, which puts the character Peter's life in peril. I think the reader will enjoy this mystery, thriller novel.
author: Kenneth Neighbors
